summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of TRIPVIA travel website (Phase 1 - Static). All core features working correctly including routing, hero slideshow, search, trip planner multi-step form, add place form, and mobile responsive layout.

ui_bugs.issue: One community photo card (@wanderlust_priya) shows gray placeholder instead of image - may be slow loading from Unsplash
Rishikesh city card shows gray placeholder instead of hero image
Rishikesh destination page hero shows gray background instead of hero image
Budget label shows 'Budget Budget' instead of just 'Budget' in results subtitle

action_items: Check Rishikesh hero_image URL in mockData.js - may be broken or slow loading
Fix Trip Planner results subtitle to show 'Budget' instead of 'Budget Budget'
critical_code_review_comments: All data is MOCKED as expected - no backend API calls
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
Mobile responsive layout works correctly with hamburger menu at 375px width
Hero slideshow crossfade transitions work with 7s interval
seed_data_creation: None - all data mocked in mockData.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: This is Phase 1 static website with all data mocked. Key files: /app/frontend/src/data/mockData.js contains all mock data. Main pages: Home, DestinationPage, TripPlannerPage, AddPlacePage, AboutPage, ContactPage. All routing works. Hero slideshow has 5 background images with 7s crossfade. Trip planner is 3-step form. Mobile drawer works at 768px breakpoint.

homepage.category_buttons: PASS - Hotels, Things to Do, Food & Cafes buttons visible and clickable
homepage.community_photos_section: PASS - 5 photos displayed, 1 with slow loading image

trip_planner.results_display: PASS - Shows suggestions based on selections
